title: FS: T206 Ed Foster (Old Mill) PSA4
author: Edwolf1963

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Ed Foster (Old Mill) PSA4
posts.post_content:
FS - T206 Ed Foster, Southern Leaguer - Old Mill Back.  PSA4.  Nice color, clarity, centering.  No creases or paper loss - nice card.  $275 delivered.  PayPal (payment owed) check or MO.  PM, post or email - first come.  

Thanks!
to $275 delivered .. otherwise he puts on his shades and goes back into storage :-)
